core_meaning.legge_1899_public_domain: Yü indicates that, (in the state which it implies), feudal princes may be set up, and the hosts put in motion, with advantage.
core_meaning.normalized_summary: Collective morale is high and aligned. The people are willing to follow, appoint leaders, and mobilize. This is powerful — but it must be guided well. If enthusiasm turns into bragging, indulgence, or paranoia, the blessing degrades.

translations.text: The first SIX, divided, shows its subject proclaiming his pleasure and satisfaction. There will be evil.

lines.normalized_meaning: Announcing how thrilled you are, showing off your excitement — that actually invites trouble. Early hype without restraint is dangerous.

translations.text: The second SIX, divided, shows one who is firm as a rock. (He sees a thing) without waiting till it has come to pass; with his firm correctness there will be good fortune.
六二：介于石，不終日，貞吉。

lines.normalized_meaning: Solid, steady, perceptive. You don't need the disaster to fully land before you act correctly. Grounded discipline brings good fortune.

translations.text: The third SIX, divided, shows one looking up (for favours), while he indulges the feeling of pleasure and satisfaction. If he would understand!--If he be late in doing so, there will indeed be occasion for repentance.

lines.normalized_meaning: Leaning on someone above you while you coast in comfort will bite you. Wake up fast. Waiting too long = regret.

translations.text: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows him from whom the harmony and satisfaction come. Great is the success which he obtains. Let him not allow suspicions to enter his mind, and thus friends will gather around him.
九四：由豫，大有得。勿疑。朋盍簪。

lines.normalized_meaning: You're the source of morale. People rally around you and big results land. Do not get paranoid — trust keeps the circle tight.

translations.text: The fifth six, divided, shows one with a chronic complaint, but who lives on without dying.

lines.normalized_meaning: The center of power is not fully healthy. There's a standing weakness, but it persists. The system survives, even if it's strained.

translations.text: The topmost six, divided, shows its subject with darkened mind devoted to the pleasure and satisfaction (of the time); but if he change his course even when (it may be considered as) completed, there will be no error.

lines.normalized_meaning: Blinded by indulgence at the peak. You're lost in the vibe. But it's still reversible: if you correct course even now, no blame.
